subdivision_of_building: The works mainly impact the poorly built, not listed 1920's extension portion of the building and minor internal works to the top floor flat.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

22_12_P00 (Site Location Plan); 22_12_P09 (Block Plan); 22_12_E01 (Existing Lower Ground Floor Plan); 22_12_E02 (Existing Upper Ground Floor Plan); 22_12_E03 (Existing First Floor Plan); 22_12_E04 (Existing Second Floor Plan); 22_12_E05 (Existing Roof Plan); 22_12_E06 (Existing Elevation to East); 22_12_E07 (Existing Elevation to North); 22_12_E08 (Existing Elevation to West); 22_12_E09 (Existing Section A:A); 22_12_E10 (Existing Section B:B); 22_12_P11 (Demolition Lower Ground Floor Plan); 22_12_P02B (Upper Ground Floor Plan); 22_12_P13 (Demolition First Floor Plan); 22_12_P14A (Demolition Second Floor Plan); 22_12_P15A (Demolition Roof Plan); 22_12_P01A (Lower Ground Floor Plan); 22_12_P12A (Demolition Upper Ground Floor Plan); 22_12_P03A (First Floor Plan); 22_12_P04B (Second Floor Plan); 22_12_P05B (Roof Plan); 22_12_P06C (Elevations to East & West); 22_12_P07B (Elevations to North); 22_12_P08B (Section A:A); 22_12_P10B (Section B:B); Design and Access Statement; KNA: 20:02:24 (Existing Windows to be replaced)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development hereby approved shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Insertion of a lift and new staircase facilitated by a two storey side extension and associated internal and external alterations; installation of solar panels; replacement of windows.
